import * as React from 'react'; import { FC } from 'react'; import PageTitle from '../UI/PageTitle/PageTitle'; export const About: FC = () => (

This project is implemented in the following technologies and frameworks:

  • ASP.NET Core Web API 3.1
  • C#.NET
  • Ocelot 16.0.1 as API Gateway
  • SQL Server Database
  • JWT Authentication
  • React 16.14.0
  • Axios API for Promise based HTTP client
  • Redux for State Management
  • Redux-Saga a middleware library for efficiently handling asynchronous side effects
  • TypeScript
  • HTML 5
  • Sass / SCSS
  • Bootstrap 4.6.0

Sample user for login:

  • Email: "sarah@yahoo.com"
  • Password: "123456"
); export default About;
